briefdescription.para: Navigationhelper is administrating the history of the pages in the frame of the programm
navigationService is controlling the rootframe changes whenever navigation occurs
a variable that is true when the user is speaking to the speech input field and false if he is typing into the speech input field
a variable that is true when speech synthesis is generating output
rootframe navigation helper is helping the rootframe navigation with keyboard events
evaluates speech input if the user is continually speaking. triggered by the user saying start listening. If the command stop listening is said, it will stop continous speech recognition
loads localized string ressources from Strings/ directory
counts the user's inputs for helping the app at guessing which field is filled out next.
evaluates speech input if the user is only speaking a defined interval (e.g while speech input button is pressed)
this event is for c# speech recognition. if it is set() then the speech recognition is stopping
variable that counts the sections to know which section has to be loades into the frame
contains the TextBoxes and other controls of the page
index of the last TextBox to which text was send with SendMessage(string, bool)
flag for preventing the Clicked(string, string)
used for text to speech synthesis
storing wether the grid is visible for grid navigation
fills the section field in formstore with information from the web form
toDo implement formstore call that saves the values of the input fields
toDo implement formstore call that loads the values of the input fields

memberdef.argsstring: (string intent, string textValue, string usersFieldName, string luisTypeOfTextValue)
memberdef.name: DetermineResponse

briefdescription.para: is essential in processing the recognized LUIS-entities. Sometimes LUIS entities are not recognized by the language model.

parameterdescription.para: the intent that LUIS recognizes. Is not importent, as this will be always Field.FillIn
the textvalue for the input field
the dirty text type name the user used in the query.
the clean text type

briefdescription.para: sets up continous speech recognition
fill Frame creates a new Page for mainFrame and adds it to the mainFrame as Content

parameterdescription.para: random element signalling background Page's colour

briefdescription.para: creates a section by adding control elements to a panel

parameterdescription.para: the section object that is being translated into controls
the panel on which to place the controls

briefdescription.para: creates an element from the section object by determining what type of element it is reference: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/37297810/updatesourcetrigger-dont-work-in-wpf-customcontrols

parameterdescription.para: The element from the section
the panel on which to add the element
as label elements have subelements, field is used for recursive calls to know the parent object

briefdescription.para: sets the enabled property of a TextBox control to disabled, if the model Element's property is set to 'disabled' string. This is the case for input elements that are only for displaying information, e.g. summing up other entries made by the user. If the TextBox stays enabled, the header will be added to the HashTable that is used by the LUIS-Model to determine to which TextBox to pass a user value to.

parameterdescription.para: The TextBox to be set
the model insatnce that saved the future property valus of the field
the panel on which all TextBoxes lie

briefdescription.para: has no speacial meaning as of yet
loads the next section into the frame

parameterdescription.para: the next-button
some arguments

briefdescription.para: helps NextButton_Click to go to the next frame's page
Button is hit for microphone activation

parameterdescription.para: the microphone button
some eventarguments

briefdescription.para: Button is hit for microphone activation

parameterdescription.para: the microphone button
some eventarguments

briefdescription.para: sets the flag whether speech recognition is enabled according to the parameter

parameterdescription.para: the parameter. If true it sets the flag and activates listenmode for false vice versa

briefdescription.para: analyzes the speech input, recognized the text and calls SendMessage() to display the rcognized text
calls the LUIS API to retrieve the Bot WebApp's answer for a specific request

parameterdescription.para: the request
flag that indicates whether the funtion is called in speech mode or text mode

briefdescription.para: helps calling actions of intents other than Field.FillIn

parameterdescription.para: the name of the intent

briefdescription.para: sets the focus to the next fields and writes message into it or delegates to the other intents

parameterdescription.para: Field.FillIn intent. If not then CheckIntents will be called again
the message the user supposedly wants in the form field
whether speech is activated or not

briefdescription.para: reads a section to the user. reading can only be stopped, if user types "shut up" or other utterance for Utilities.Stop intent

parameterdescription.para: the controls in the current section

briefdescription.para: lets the App speak the answer to the user

parameterdescription.para: the answer to be spoken

briefdescription.para: handles exceptions in the speechrecognition api. Also checks whether the device the user in using has enabled microphone input
initialized speech recognition
handles the HypothesisGenerated event of the speech recognizer

parameterdescription.para: the speech recognizer
arguments that may be passed

briefdescription.para: Method that is reacting each time a key is hit while the textinput field has focus.
is called after the login was sucessful
helper method for cleaning output from luis. Since LUIS answers in lowercase only, this method uppercases the first letter
contains the navigation buttons of the app as well as the speech input field
